item.description:
A 6.0 mile loop hike of moderate difficulty mostly on the Ragged Mountain Preserve Trail but also a little under a half of the hike on a part of the Metacomet Trail. There will be cliffs, water views, and a modest amount of up/down on the traprock ridge. Plenty of angular rocks as is common on these ridges.

Those who wish to go should have:

* A daypack - To carry water and keep your hands free
* Hiking boots
* 2 quarts of water
* Bug spray - Ticks & mosquitoes are out
* Hiking poles would be helpful

The meetup will be at 9 AM at the parking area off of West Lane in Berlin. Parking may be limited so RSVP's are limited. We would finish up no later than about 1:30 PM but a good chance we will be done a bit earlier.

 

Approximate location/directions (watch for dirt parking area on north side shoulder, roughly 499 West Ln, Berlin, CT):
http://mapq.st/15zzx1M

Map is in " Connecticut Walk Book: West" 19th ed., by Connecticut forest and Park Association as map ME-3b on page 180.
